messages.subject: Re: Picture of Nagakura's Daughter
messages.msgSnippet: If you examine the pic...the right side of the picture is damaged...her face was restored ...note the 1/2 missing eyebrow, hair line and indeed much of the
messages.messageBody:
If you examine the pic...the right side of the picture is
damaged...her face was "restored"...note the 1/2 missing eyebrow,
hair line and indeed much of the right side seems drawn in...I'm not
an expert but I find the attempt from someone long long ago to
preserve this image to be fascinating.

Information on the book and how to purchase the book is
below...again this image is from Tama (^_^) WHERE WOULD WE BE
WITHOUT TAMA?

I think the shape of Okada's face and her lips match Nagakura in his
picture when he was younger...
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/nagakura02.jpg

And don't forget to read Nagakura's fact sheet
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/nagakura.htm

messages.subject: Re: The *NEW* Photo of Saitou Discussed.....
messages.msgSnippet: Our incredible fangirl kunoichi...TAMA...works very very quickly....she scanned the newly discovered photo of Fujita Goro already!  THANK YOU TAMA (and yes we
messages.messageBody:
Our incredible fangirl kunoichi...TAMA...works very very
quickly....she scanned the newly discovered photo of Fujita Goro
already! THANK YOU TAMA (and yes we are interested in Yaso as well)

http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/FGNew.jpg

Tama scanned text which accompanies this photo as well...I will work
on reducing image size.

*things to notice in the photo

Fujita Goro is the elderly man in the back with a moustache

Fujita Tsuyoshi

there is a gentleman to the right of Fujita Goro who looks EXACTLY
like his current living descendent Fujita Taro (see "PHOTOS" file
for the memorial to Saitou)

messages.subject: Re: The *NEW* Photo of Saitou Discussed.....
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.1to5.net/cgi-bin/sai/bbs/apeboard_plus.cgi also talks about the photo, some posters have seen it already but nifty.com/globalgate translations are
messages.messageBody:
http://www.1to5.net/cgi-bin/sai/bbs/apeboard_plus.cgi
also talks about the photo, some posters have seen it already but
nifty.com/globalgate translations are not clear on their opinion...

the board also discusses possible interpretations on NHK Saitou's
need to constantly carve those little wooden figures...have fun
trying to figure out what the posts say (-_-)

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] The *NEW* Photo of Saitou Discussed.....
messages.msgSnippet: That new photo has been finally published though! It s in the Rekishi Dokuhon magazine s december issue and I put Amazon.jp link here.
messages.messageBody:
That new photo has been finally published though!
It's in the "Rekishi Dokuhon" magazine's december issue and I put
Amazon.jp link here.
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000678JHS/qid=1099500083/sr=1-1/ref=sr_1_8_1/249-8723370-8545105

I'll check it tomorrow in book shop.

I put again a helpful link of How to buy Japanese books on Amazon.jp
http://imaginatorium.org/books/aj.htm
And here is the link to the sound track CD of NHK Shinsengumi for those
who interested in.

http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B00018WKLI/qid=1099500621/sr=1-1/ref=sr_1_10_1/249-8723370-8545105

The purchase system for CD works exactly as same as books.

Tama
